#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 int main()
{

    string a;long long int b,t;
    long long int p,q,r,s,rem,n,ans;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>a;cin>>b;
        int l=a.length();
         n=a[l-1]-'0';
        if(b==0)
            ans=1;
        else
        {
            p=n%10;
            q=(n*n)%10;
            r=(n*n*n)%10;
            s=(n*n*n*n)%10;
            rem=b%4;
            if(rem==0)
                ans=s;
            else if(rem==1)
                ans=p;
            else if(rem==2)
                ans=q;
            else if(rem==3)
                ans=r;
        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;
        }
return 0;
    }
